name: Lineared
description:
This is a game made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

Play as a character in One Dimensional space

Controls:

Space to move forward

K to deflect Enemies/Projectiles

This game was made in 6 hours because I didn't have much time :(

Edit: I just realized that this game also fits the theme as “Only One Sprite” 

made in Unity
